description:
Modern Minimal One Bedroom apartment in one of the most desirable areas of Harlem. The apartment features clean white walks and beautiful hardwood floors. This doorman apartment gets great light and features a TV with Roku (Hulu, Netflix, Starz), Wifi, and access to gym. 

Short walk to 135th St subway (2/3 train) and comfortable walk to A and 6 trains for easy access to Manhattan (20 mins to Times Square)

Close to the center of Harlem - 125th Street!

Its a chic, modern. minimal one bedroom with white walls and gorgeous hardwood floors. There's a cute little alcove kitchen and subway tile bathroom.

You will have access to all part of the space except locked closets.

I am 100% responsive - feel completely free to reach out to me with any questions.

The apartment is in the historic Harlem...15 blocks from 125th St. (the center of Harlem) restaurants and bars...25 mins from Time Square...and in the same neighborhood as the Schaumburg Center and other historic Harlem sites.

Walking distance to the 2/3/6/A/B/C/D trains
name: Gorgeous Sunlit One Bedroom - Uptown Manhattan
review: Great location in Harlem! Easy access to main streets, shops and historic sites like Apollo Theatre and Hamilton Grange House. Really fun location and walking distance to public transportation. Host was flexible with checkout times which was helpful due to our late flight.
